content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the kiddie pool with my friends 7 yr old. i looked up and saw something glint in the sunlight nw of the house in the sky. i watched it for a second or two then got out of the pool to get my camera phone. i took video of it lasting 11 minutes and 8 seconds. i kept losing sight of it, as it would glint, then disappear, it was near some clouds and i tried to keep them in view for a reference mark. it seemed to hover in the same spot for several minutes, then move away and possibly ascend. i finally lost visual sight of it towards the end of the video heading nnw. 

i reported a similar sighting yesterday case 59181 and thought for some reason it came back, but the object i saw yesterday was 3 times the size and was glowing white, then changed to red/orange. the object today was more reflective and shiny white looking and smaller. it did not change color as i observed it.

i'm not certain if the reflective glints show up in the video clearly or if it can be enhanced to show it better.
content.summary: Sitting in pool with child, looked up and saw something glint in the sunlight nw of house in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my back door and sat at my picnic table in a chair facing ne and noticed what i first thought was a bright star, but it was moving towards my direction. i didn't have my cellphone on on me so i ran in the house and grabbed my phone, i ran outside and began taking photos of the brightly  lit orb. i used the zoom on my camera and began taking photos.The  last ones are of the object passing over head and as it can still be seen through the trees in my back yard. the time span was about 2 minutes over all. no noise, straight path towards se. i was not afraid, just curious of what this object was (is).
content.summary: Brightly lit object moving nw to sw, straight path, no noise. photos attached

content.detailedDescription: I was woken up because of an earthquake at about 315am. went to my front door walked out side and saw a very bright object though the fog. i kept looking at the object in my site. the object broke through the clouds and was about 150ft above the houses moving northwest very slowly. the object was extremely bright. blue and purple and red lights were coming from the object. the object the moved northwest slowly over me and the stopped. the object then shot a huge bright light into the air and shot through the fog making an indent in the fog.
content.summary: Was woken up at 315am because of earthquake. went out side an witnessed an object about 150 feet in the sky heading northwest moving very slow and glowing blue lights coming from the object. object stopped and shot a straight blue light into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I did not see it, my boyfriend did and he does not want to report it because he thinks he'll sound crazy however other people did see it too. he called me when he saw it and explained it as "green and red strobe lights flashing every where" he said it was moving too fast to be an aircraft of any kind. he also said it would disapear and reappear in different places. at first there was only one and then it disappeared. he continued driving to watseka from danville  (he was in the outskirts of milford when he first saw it) then he saw another one but it was only green. he decided to turn around and found the original red and green one had reappeared. i told him to go home and on his way home he continued to see one reappear above his head. this is what i can remember from our conversation last night. there may be more details or i may have gotten a few wrong. i also know that other people from around the bismarck, hoopeston, and milford areas had seen a green flashing figure in the sky. i'm still trying to get my boyfriend to report what he saw so that he can tell it in full detail.  he also tried to take a picture but it was too dark and did not show up on his phone
content.summary: Red and green lights flashing   moved quickly up down left and right. disapeared and reappeared

content.detailedDescription: Me and my fiancee went out onto our back porch to smoke a cigarette a little before 2 am early sunday morning. we were talking and all of a sudden she tells me to make a wish because she saw a shooting star. she pointed at the direction she said she saw the shooting star and she asked me what shooting stars do. as i began to tell her what shooting stars were while looking at the area of the sky she saw it from she said very loudly "there it is again". we watched this thing which was a mix between a disc shape and a circle move at a high rate of speed from a north east to south west direction, then it shot straight up for about 500 feet or so, and then quickly changed direction heading back north east, this went vertical in a squiggly motion for a split second, stopped and hovered, then darted of east at a rapid speed and directional change. the thing made no noise at all and appeared to be probably about 5-8 miles away in the sky. could have been closer but it was hard to tell exactly. it really started and baffled my fiancee because she didn't really believe in ufo's until after this happened. what was truly amazing is how fast this thing moved and the maneuvers it made in changed direction so sharply at such a high rate of speed. i was in the military for five years and have seen my fare share of strange things in the sky before, but this one has to be one of the most vivid sightings i have had. the only reason we lost sight of the object was because the trees in our back yard got in the way as it moved back in that north easterly direction. it really affected my fiancee because she has never experienced anything like that before. it definitely was not an aircraft because there were no port and starboard lights, nor was there any sound at all. something moving that fast in the sky and maneuvering that quickly on a dime would have made a lot of engine noise had it been mad made. being that it happened so quickly and that our cell phones were on the charger for the night we were unable to get any photos of it. definitely going to keep a camera handy by the porch in case we see this thing again.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extreme speed and directional change

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend was in front of our house smoking a cigarette.  he looked up and saw 2 lights in the sky.  he came  and got me and when i got outside there were 5-6 lights in the sky.  as we stood there and watched more and more lights kept appearing until we saw over 20 total. they would appear from behind the buildings in the nw and flew towards the west.  each light flew independently.  some of them went in a seemingly straight line until they disappeared above the clouds.  some of them would stop and hover then keep moving.  some of them changed direction.  ultimately they all disappeared into the clouds.  they just kept coming.. there were anywhere from 2-6 of them visible at one time.  all the lights were round and glowed a very bright orange gold color. (unfortunately you cannot see how bright they were in the video, or how gold they were.  in the video they look more whitish).  some of them flew on a lower trajectory and some flew higher; the lowest ones looked to be about 30 degrees and the highest were maybe 50-60.   i've never seen anything like it and i live in a very urban area; i see helicopters and planes all the time.  after about 2 minutes of watching i ran inside and got my phone to film it.. the film is about 4 minutes long but they were coming before and after i stopped filming; i'd say about 20 minutes total.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: About 23 orange/gold light seen flying across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Taking photos of sunrise atop mount cowlyd, north wales, near trefriw, approx 6 am ish, clear sky, no wind, rainclouds obscuring sunrise in far distance, noticed serquential bangs/rumbles like claps of thunder, though at regular intervals, approx 1/2 seconf apart, startled sheep in field by us, lasted approx 5-10 mins, distracted by animals disturbed, changed direction once, approx 25 degree turn northwards after approaching from west.Map co -ords 53.159012,-3.857143 facing west
content.summary: Taking photos of sunrise

content.detailedDescription: Leaving house to go and deliver newspapers i happened to lookup to see a streak of light pass over a jet flying lower than the streak of light. i think it was a shooting star. as i went down the stairs i looked s.W.And observed what seemed to be a fireball . it danced around a bit went sideways at great speed and returned but not out of site . it then hovered a bit then went upwards and back then went into sort of a wave flight path. than hovered but was not still .I have witnessed this once before generally in the same place on march 11 of 2014 .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a craft in the sw sky at 3 in the morning along with a passing jet possiable second craft streaking over the jet

content.detailedDescription: Very large flashing light however did not move.
content.summary: Large flashing light ,both my husband and i observed it.  did not move.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about midnight.  i took the dog out by the lake behind my house.  nothing unusual at first. all at once an intense blue/white light came on and was shining down thru the tree i was under. the first thing i thought of was i was in a direct path of a lightning strike (it was that intense!).

i looked skyward, did not get a chance to move to a completely open area.  but from my vantage the area around me was completely illuminated and as i looked up there was a unbelievably bright light about 3x as big as the moon. as soon as i caught a glimpse of it ...Like flipping a switch,,, it just disappeared from the sky. then all i saw were stars in the sky. no clouds. no planes. nothing.

there was no movement..No noise.. weirdest thing i have seen in 61 years. not a comet (no tail)... stationary.. intense light for approximately 5 seconds then gone.  that's it.. wish it would have stayed around long enough to provide more information,

i would be curious if anyone else in the area saw it.
content.summary: Intense blue/white light , thought i was about to be hit by lightming.  no clouds, no sound..Switched on then off. approximately 5-10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I haven't picture of that object because that time no camera in my hands
           sorry 4 that,,,,...
content.summary: I couldn't manag the events like that sorry

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I had been cleaning out my car late cuz its so hot in st.Louis, mo like really really hot and humid with almost no air motion at all.  so i look south and there's this giant light in the sky....Moving fast (approx 3 min horizon to horizon) and its the size of the moon or bigger and it comes right over my head... maybe up to 4times the size of the moon at that point. couldn't determine height. clear night. what really caught my attention was the diamond shape, and the flikering light. it had a strong diamond/square shaped halo that had solid seeming edges and surface but bounced around as if not a solid object but rather a halo. traveling point forward, with a white flame in the front corner. so it was a strong flickering flame with a diamond shaped halo that had solid seeming edges and surface but bounced and flickered in such a way as to seem more halo than solid.
when it was right over head i thought... looks like a hot air ballon..But to move that fast on a dead still night going south to north and at the apparent size... i don't think thats possible.. i'm absolutely convinced they were not hot air balloons. but thats the closest thing my mind could come up with. no sound, no change of direction... followed by at least 3 more.... i ran upstairs and tweeted after the 1st 2 got my phone then went back out to see 2 more go by. all same speed horizon to horizon in about 3 min... very fast for a ballon, unless it was in the jet stream but im very very skeptical these were ballons. shot video to document ... my experience was much more brilliant and bigger.  video doesn't do it justice. but at least i can back up the story.  [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Giant bright diamond halo with flickering

content.detailedDescription: I first witnessed what i thought was a very bright star, until i seen it move down and then 90 degrees perfect turn to the right very fast. i had family camping out in a camper, 4 people, i started screaming for them to come outside that there was something strange in the sky. they all came out and we all witnessed the object, pulsing, hovering in the same place, and then it would shoot up or down very fast, and then always to the right and then back stationary. i sent 2 of them inside to get my binoculars, i then sat them on the mailbox to keep them steady, it was really big for being i would say about 3 to 5 miles away. it moved in the same pattern several times, and then would go back to hovering for 20 minutes or so. we then moved the binoculars to a fence post and began to take photos from a phone, on zoom. we could clearly see the entire object was changing color, white to green to red, could not tell if there was any pattern though, we all looked in the binoculars and we all seen the same thing. we tried to video it and the phone would not zoom on video though. so looking through binocular lens with a camera on a phone, we then filmed with another phone the image on the first phones screen. we had tears, we were kind of overwhelmed and a bit scared, it last for about 2 hours that we seen and viewed it, until we started loading the video on the laptop and it was gone, vanished.
content.summary: Pulsating ball from white to green to red, moved several times very fast to right then stayed still last 2 hours

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in our back deck and i noticed a red ball rising in the distance. i told my wife to look and she thought it was a planet. it rose and was big and looked reddish. it hovered a but then flew over the house about 3-4000 feet. my wife ran and got my phone and took a picture as it was leaving. after it happened and we looked at the picture we were curious to discover what it was. we lost site of it after it went to the east because there are several trees around our property.
content.summary: Saw image from back porch looked like planet mars and it rose straight up then hovered and then came toward east at high rate of speed. took picture as it was leaving..Looked like red but picture is blue.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around the back of the shed to urinate. was contently listening to the insects and frogs, and wondering i was being watched by "alien entities" in the rice fields. i noticed what i thought was a plane to my left, around the north westerly direction approx. 2 outstretched hands above the horizon. the initial thought was that it was a plane, as it was a light flashing across the sky. blink off for 1-3 seconds and blink back on for a flash approx. 2 outstretched handwidths away heading in an easterly, circular along the horizon, direction. this continued for around 12 to 15 blinks as i slowely turned nearly 180 degrees to track its path until it was lost to sight in the east. i considered it a plane initially to be a plane, but was moving way too fast to be conventional aircraft. then i considered the possibility of a high altitude meteorite skipping across the upper atmosphere, much like a stone skipping across the surface of a pond. this was also dismissed as the object disappeared and reappeared at different heights above the horizon. another possibility was was some type of experimental scram jet, which would account for the brief flash of light and the object appearing seconds later a long way form where it was, it also left a small trail when it flashed "on". all this happened within a matter of approx. 20-30 seconds.I lost sight of the object when i had to change positions to go around a tree. it was reasonably heavy patchy cloud, and i could see what i believe to be, the lights reflected on the clouds, udon thani city. it was around there that i lost sight of the object.
content.summary: A fast moving blinking bright object.

content.detailedDescription: On the deck talking with my friend when i saw flash of light.  i saw 5 emerald green lights that appeared just above tree line and turned red.   friend shot up from the flash
content.summary: Flash of light. 5 green dots then 2 red dots.  2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my bathroom window at around  10 pm and noticed  what i thought to be a large plane among the stars. after watching it for several minutes i realized it was not going anywhere but was just hovering back and forth with about 60 flahing lights of yellow red and green. it is now thirty minutes later and the object is still in the same place. i kept trying to detect a flight path but it never moves on one it just hovers back and forth. i live in a very rural area with great visibilty of the stars and this is not a star. i have not lost sight of the object as of yet.
content.summary: Object is hovering in one spot with lights flashing no indication of flight path

content.detailedDescription: Saw orange glowing bell shaped silent craft moving slowly from e to w low in the sky across southampton, ny. saw it for 20 seconds before it disappeared behind tree line.
content.summary: Bright, orange, glowing, silent, bell shaped craft moving slowly e to w . lost sight of it behind trees

content.detailedDescription: We went outside to smoke a cigarette when i noticed a large orange globe from the ne direction going through the sky higher until it disappeared in the nw direction. from my back porch we were facing brawley school road. the globes were quite big in the sky seeming to be very close (there are always planes going over our house because there is the charlotte douglas airport south of us). these looked like they took off (literally) from exit 36 off of 77 or in that same direction. anyhow after seeing the one we noted another one coming up from the treetops (these all went diagonally and upwards in the same direction), then three more behind it all going at the same speed but together and very close only to disappear within 7 seconds of taking off in the sky. before the others disappeared there were 3 more behind those. both of us were in shock because this is the second time we've ever seen anything like this and it's so close to our home. we both ran inside to grab our phones to try to take video of any more orbs that might be going up but sadly both of our phones have completely useless cameras at night (i also tried my sons tablet and 3ds but neither would record anything with this street light on the road next to us facing our direction). my boyfriend gave up and came inside (while we were outside with our cameras we seen maybe four more) but i posted a message on facebook hoping someone else would go outside and record what we were seeing. i stayed outside for maybe ten minutes more seeing at least four more and then after that it stopped. during my observation there were at least 6 planes i noted flying overhead far far up in the sky. from my back porch they are so tiny, but these globes were huge in comparison (hence the aspirin size, i'd say planes are usually about pencil tip size). i'd also like to point out that during this our bulldog went nuts. he never barks at things he sees in the sky nor even seems to notice things like this but upon the first few that we seen he started barking and growling at them. he stayed with me outside and continued to growl every time he seen one. this surprised both of us the most because he's never growled at things in the sky.
content.summary: 15 or so orange globes pulsated and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On august 18, 2014. 11:58 p.M. mary rae baird was driving on st. clair from the ravensburg bridge towards the golden gate restaurant with her three children alex,morgan and kyle. she spotted a pinkish orange glowing object slightly to the right in the sky at this time it appeared stationary at the same time alex who was in the front seat also saw the object he says it appears more redish shortly after they pulled over in the golden gate parking lot alex quickly snapped photos of the object starting at 11:59 p.M. as it was traveling south by southwest until i blinked out of sight through clouds in the distance at about 12:05 p.M. the object was to bright to be a plane and alex could not see any blinking lights which are required by law at night it was also silent.
content.summary: Sighting on st. clair

content.detailedDescription: Mid-afternoon,my girlfriend &l were outside--she shouts-- look up at that thing-l look and see it-then another appears and follows the first- then a third object-they stay equal distance from each other maintaining same speed and trajectory (south to north)they continue until out of sight range
content.summary: 3 cylinder objects flew over city ,many witness •-•broad daylight..Seem to just appear then move at a relatively slower speed heading due north toward owattona mn

content.detailedDescription: On google earth-moon i looked at a supposed statue on the moon.  i then looked and found one evenly spaced far apart leading in a straight line to mons la hire, which is a mountain in the region.  each object has the appearance of a large human statue's shadow.
content.summary: Appearance of line of statues leading to mons la hire

content.detailedDescription: Mid-afternoon,my girlfriend &l were outside--she shouts-- look up at that thing-l look and see it-then another appears and follows the first- then a third object-they stay equal distance from each other maintaining same speed and trajectory (south to north)they continue until out of sight range
content.summary: 3 cylinder objects flew over city ,many witness •-•broad daylight..Seem to just appear then move at a relatively slower speed heading due north toward owattona mn

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to the back yard to smoke a cigarette when i observed a glowing white object moving slowly in the eastern sky. as i continued watching, it stopped and hovered for more than 5 minutes. after that time it began moving again in a westerly direction, towards me and over the house, stopping and hovering, changing it's path and then ascending. during this time the color of the object changed from glowing white to glowing red/orange, not gradually, but instantly, like someone flicked a switch. i ran inside and grabbed my phone and used the camera to try and capture images and video of it, samsung galaxy s . during my attempt to get it on film, my camera froze up a few times and i became nervous and started to feel like i was getting a headache, but that may be due to my having to look up while filming and keep my focus on the object. as the object reached & passed over the house towards the west i noticed another object similar in look and size, but white, northeast of the object. at one point they were almost parallel but with a good distance between them. the original object i observed seemed to be getting smaller (ascending) while the other object remained in the same area. then they were both gone. total viewing time of the incident was approximately 20 minutes 6:38 pm - 6:58pm. 

i'm unable to upload any video or images on here, and not certain if my camera was able to capture it all, but will attempt to send the information if contacted by an investigator. from quickly viewing the last images and where the object was against other stationary objects, it shows a faint shape/color.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed glowing white object moving slowly in the eastern sky as i continued watching, it stopped and hovering for more than 5 minutes. after that time it began moving again in a westerly direction, again stopping and hovering for a period of time.

content.detailedDescription: Went into kitchen for a drink,stood on cold floor in sock ,needed to pee fast opened back door,started to wee looking up at a clear night see all stars, then triangle shape very very bright traveling downwards, very very fast, not like a shooting star no drag no tail 1 to 2 seconds then gone
content.summary: Triangle very bright no tail very fast travelling straight down silent but looked closer than 5 miles

content.detailedDescription: Woke up in the late middle of the night to check pool area for potential burglars. looked to the southeast and saw a slow yellow moving star which emitted beams of light upon observation. the following nights the yellow star remained near the same the direction of observation then disappeared never to be seen again.
content.summary: A sentient moving star which detects human thoughts and responds

content.detailedDescription: How many  levels are at base north bay
content.summary: Formation of v 9 hovered one split of f short time (seconds) one left then the rest left  houver  yes

content.detailedDescription: I was outside observing the stars as it was a very clear night.Suddenly a black disk shaped object with blue lights shaped in a triangle shot past over mile away faster than any aircraft known to human beings and after around 2 - 3 seconds it vanished with no trace. as soon as i saw it i knew it was a ufo. at first i was shocked but then as it sank in i realised what i had just witnessed and couldn't believe it! like i said it vanished into thin air.
content.summary: Black disk with blue lights shaped in a triangle, travelling at very high speed

content.detailedDescription:
My brother in 2012 was in san diego with his girlfriend and they were taking some pictures.  they were just recently looking back at the attached photos on a large screen tv and noticed a black dot in the photos.  when they started to play around with the image we were all shocked by what we found.  we also played around with the color, contrast, brightness of the pictures, i have attached those also.  what we found was amazing.  we would love to have them reviewed by professionals with professional software to see what turns up.  in one of the photos that was adjusted there looks to be some disturbance of the air around the craft, it almost looks like a key hole in the sky.  when compared to the rest of the sky you have to ask yourself what exactly is going on there.  

the first three images are the originals.  the one image named crazy ufo has been adjusted for best viewing.  if you zoom in to 800% you can observe the strange phenomenon happening in the sky.  

my brother and i are both professionals and my background is bio/chem/physics so we are not crazy folks looking for attention.  we would just like to know what exactly is in these images.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: Ufo observed in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I did not observe it by naked eye. i saw it while i was checking my photos.
last year me and my wife visited our friends at eskiþehir (a large city in middle region of turkey.). i was taking photos of my friends and my wife. non of us observed any thing at the sky. days after, when i was wiewing the photographs, i saw a thing on a photo that ý couldn't explain. i attached the picture below. maybe it's a reflection of some other thing like lazer show.
content.summary: I did not observe it by naked eye. i saw it while i was checking my photos.
